instructor.about: As a software developer at Microsoft with a background from SRM University Chennai, I have cultivated extensive experience in technology and education. My dedication to mentoring budding developers has enabled me to impact many students' careers positively. Leveraging my comprehensive industry experience, I strive to guide and inspire the next generation of innovators.

courses.title: React Js
courses.overview: Welcome to "React Foundations: Crafting Your Digital Portfolio - Part 1," a comprehensive course designed to take you on a journey through the foundational elements of React and modern web development. This course is meticulously structured to build your skills progressively, starting from the basics of setting up a React environment to deploying a fully functional digital portfolio.
whatWillILearn: Beginners will have solid foundation in React.
will able to enhance React skills and understand its core principles in depth.
deploying a digital portfolio using React.

curriculum.chapter_name: Getting Started with React and Setup

lessons.lesson_name: Understand React File Structure along with Hello World
Intro to use state and Hooks
Async Nature of Use State - Part 1
Async Nature of Use State - Part 2
Async Nature of Use State - Part 3

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the ReactJS course?
faqs.answer: Access to course materials (provided post-enrollment), a computer with a modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, or Edge), a code editor (like VS Code), and a stable internet connection.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the ReactJS course?
faqs.answer: Yes, a basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. Familiarity with ES6 features (like arrow functions, classes, and modules) will be beneficial.

faqs.question: How long does the ReactJS course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course is designed to be completed in 8 to 12 weeks, depending on your learning pace and the time you dedicate to practicing coding exercises and building projects.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or projects in this course?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, the course includes hands-on coding exercises, projects, and assignments to build interactive web applications using ReactJS, reinforcing the concepts and techniques taught.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the ReactJS course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you will be proficient in building dynamic and responsive web applications using ReactJS. You'll understand component-based architecture, state management, and React hooks, preparing you for front-end developer roles.

instructor.about: I'm Angela, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I'm the lead instructor at the London App Brewery, London's leading Programming Bootcamp. I've helped hundreds of thousands of students learn to code and change their lives by becoming a developer. I've been invited by companies such as Twitter, Facebook and Google to teach their employees. My first foray into programming was when I was just 12 years old, wanting to build my own Space Invader game. Since then, I've made hundred of websites, apps and games. But most importantly, I realised that my greatest passion is teaching. I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand. I'll be there for you every step of the way.

courses.title: Airline and Airport operation
courses.overview: This comprehensive course in Aviation Resource Management offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical skills essential for managing resources in the aviation industry. Designed for students and professionals in engineering, technology, management, and science domains, the curriculum covers various aspects of resource management, including human resources, financial management, operational assets, and risk management in aviation settings. Through a mix of lectures, case studies, and hands-on sessions, students will learn to apply modern management principles to the unique challenges of the aviation industry. The course also incorporates the latest industry trends and technologies, preparing participants for successful careers in aviation management. By the end of the course, students will have a thorough understanding of how to optimize aviation operations, improve efficiency, and contribute to the safety and profitability of aviation enterprises.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and apply the principles of airline and airport operations in various real-world scenarios.
Design and implement effective passenger and cargo handling strategies to improve operational efficiency.
Evaluate and manage safety and security measures in compliance with aviation regulations.

curriculum.chapter_name: Introduction to Airline and Airport Operations

courses.title: Banking and financial services management
courses.overview: This course is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge required to excel in the banking and financial services industry. Covering a wide range of topics from the basics of banking operations to advanced financial management techniques, it combines theoretical concepts with practical applications to ensure students are job-ready upon completion. This curriculum is structured to foster critical thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making skills essential for a successful career in banking and finance.

courses.title: Retail Marketing
courses.overview: This course is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of retail marketing, integrating technology and management strategies to enhance customer experiences and drive sales. Covering a range from basic to advanced digital strategies, the curriculum includes data analysis, CRM, supply chain management, and e-commerce trends. It offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical skills, with hands-on sessions, case studies, and capstone projects aimed at preparing students for the dynamic retail industry.
whatWillILearn: Design and implement effective retail strategies enhancing customer engagement and loyalty.
Utilize digital marketing tools to boost online presence and sales.
Analyze and interpret market trends to make informed retail marketing decisions.

lessons.lesson_name: Role of Retail in the Economy

faqs.question: Is this going to be a helpful course.
faqs.answer: Definitely Yes.

faqs.question: What am I going to learn from this course?
faqs.answer: You will learn retail marketing strategies, customer engagement, digital tools, market analysis, and much more, tailored for the dynamic retail industry.

faqs.question: Can I improve my business with the strategies learned in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, this course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills to enhance your retail business.

reviews.review: This course helped me grasp the fundamentals of retail marketing and how to apply them in a real-world setting. The assignments were challenging but rewarding, and the feedback from instructors was constructive.

The Retail Marketing course was enlightening and covered a wide range of topics from branding to customer engagement strategies. The real-life examples and case studies were particularly helpful in understanding the material.

I found the Retail Marketing course to be extremely beneficial. It was well-organized, and the content was current with today's market trends. The interactive sessions were great for clarifying doubts and exchanging ideas.

As someone new to the retail industry, this course was a perfect introduction. It covered all the basics and more, providing me with a solid foundation to build upon. I especially appreciated the practical tips and tools provided.

The Retail Marketing course exceeded my expectations. The lessons were clear, engaging, and packed with useful information. I now feel more confident in creating effective marketing strategies for my retail business.

courses.title: Disaster Risk Reduction
courses.overview: This course offers an interdisciplinary approach to integrating disaster risk reduction (DRR) with development planning to enhance resilience and reduce vulnerabilities in various contexts. It covers the principles of disaster risk management, sustainable development, and climate change adaptation, emphasizing the importance of incorporating risk assessment and mitigation strategies into development projects and policies. Through a mix of theoretical concepts and hands-on sessions, students will learn to apply DRR strategies, use GIS and remote sensing for risk analysis, and develop comprehensive disaster management and development plans. The curriculum is designed to equip students with the skills to address the challenges of reducing disaster risk in the context of global environmental change and to promote sustainable development goals (SDGs). By the end of the course, participants will have a deep understanding of the complexities of disaster risk and development planning and the competencies to develop integrated solutions that enhance resilience and sustainability.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and interpret disaster risk scenarios using GIS and remote sensing data.
Design and implement risk reduction and sustainable development strategies.
Integrate climate change adaptation measures into development planning.

lessons.lesson_name: The Role of Governance in DRR

curriculum.chapter_name: Integration of DRR and Sustainable Development

lessons.lesson_name: Impacts of Climate Change on Disaster Risks

courses.title: Logistic management
courses.overview: This Advanced Certificate Course in Logistic Management is designed to equip students with the essential skills and knowledge required to excel in the field of logistics and supply chain management. Combining 45 to 60 hours of expert-led lectures with hands-on practical sessions, the course covers the latest trends, technologies, and strategies in logistic management. Students will learn to analyze and optimize logistic operations, implement efficient supply chain strategies, and utilize logistic software. The curriculum is structured to ensure a deep understanding of logistic principles, application of technology in logistics, and the development of strategic decision-making skills. Through real-world case studies, software tools application, and project-based learning, students will be prepared to address complex logistic challenges in a global context.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and optimize logistics and supply chain processes using contemporary methodologies.
Implement effective inventory management, warehousing, and distribution strategies to enhance operational efficiency.
Utilize logistic management software tools for planning, forecasting, and execution of logistic operations.

courses.title: Investment Management
courses.overview: This comprehensive course on Investment Management is designed to equip students and fresh graduates, particularly those pursuing or having completed degrees in Technology and Management, with the essential skills and knowledge required to excel in the dynamic field of investment management. Integrating theoretical foundations with extensive hands-on practice, the curriculum covers a wide range of topics, from the basics of investment theory to advanced strategies used by professionals in the field. Students will learn how to analyze financial markets, assess investment opportunities, and manage investment portfolios to maximize returns while minimizing risks. The course includes real-world case studies, cutting-edge tools and software for investment analysis, and interactive sessions with industry experts to prepare participants for successful careers in investment management. By the end of this course, students will have a deep understanding of how to apply technology and management principles to solve complex investment problems, making them valuable assets in the global financial industry.

Employ strategic asset allocation and rebalancing techniques to optimize returns and minimize risks.

courses.title: Cloud computing
courses.overview: This certification course is designed to equip students with advanced knowledge and practical skills in cloud computing and system architecture. It covers a range of topics from cloud service models, deployment strategies, to architecting cloud-native applications, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security within digital infrastructures. The curriculum integrates theoretical concepts with hands-on sessions, providing students the opportunity to work on real-world projects and case studies. By the end of this course, students will have a deep understanding of how to design and manage scalable, highly available, and fault-tolerant systems on the cloud.
whatWillILearn: Design and deploy scalable, reliable, and secure cloud infrastructure using best practices
Implement and manage virtualized environments for enhanced efficiency
Architect high-performing cloud-native applications

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the Cloud Computing course?
faqs.answer: You'll need access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer, and a stable internet connection.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the Cloud Computing course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required, but familiarity with basic computer concepts and programming can be helpful.

faqs.question: How long does the Cloud Computing course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course typically takes 6 to 8 weeks to complete, depending on your pace and schedule.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes hands-on exercises and practical labs to give you real-world experience with cloud computing platforms.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Cloud Computing course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll have a solid understanding of cloud computing concepts, deployment models, and services, preparing you for roles in cloud architecture, development, or administration.

courses.title: Data Analysis
courses.overview: This comprehensive course is designed to equip students with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel in data analysis and visualization, using powerful tools such as Excel and SAS, among others. The curriculum blends theoretical knowledge with practical, hands-on experience, ensuring that students can apply data analysis techniques in real-world scenarios. The course covers from the basics of data manipulation and statistical analysis to advanced data visualization techniques and predictive modeling, using both Excel and SAS. It caters to a wide range of students and professionals aiming to leverage data analysis in their field, emphasizing practical application and understanding of how data-driven decisions can significantly impact real-world outcomes. By the end of the course, participants will have a robust understanding of how to manage, analyze, and visualize data, making them an invaluable asset in the job market.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and interpret complex datasets using advanced Excel and SAS techniques (Analyze).
Develop and implement predictive models to forecast trends and behaviors (Evaluate).
Create impactful visualizations to effectively communicate data insights (Create).

lessons.lesson_name: Overview of Data Analysis; Importance in various sectors
Introduction to Data Analysis Tools - Part 1 (Excel)
Introduction to Data Analysis Tools - Part 2 (SQL)
Introduction to Data Analysis Tools - Part 3 (Python)
Basic Excel Operations for Data Analysis
Data Cleaning and Preparation in Excel
Excel Functions and Formulas for Data Analysis - Part 1
Excel Functions and Formulas for Data Analysis - Part 2

curriculum.chapter_name: Intro to Python for Data Analysis

faqs.question: What do I need to get started with the Data Analysis course?
faqs.answer: Access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer capable of running data analysis software (such as Excel, SQL, and Python), and a stable internet connection are required to get started.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the Data Analysis course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required to start this course. However, a basic understanding of mathematics (especially statistics) and familiarity with any programming language can be beneficial to grasp concepts more quickly.

faqs.question: How long does the Data Analysis course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course typically takes 60 hours to complete, which can be spread over 6 weeks at a pace of 10 hours per week. However, the completion time may vary depending on your learning speed and schedule.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or real-world projects in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes practical exercises, hands-on training with data analysis tools, and real-world projects to ensure that learners can apply the concepts and techniques learned in actual data analysis scenarios.

courses.title: Cyber Security
courses.overview: This certification course is meticulously designed to transition students from foundational cybersecurity concepts to advanced strategies and practices essential for protecting and securing information assets. Over the duration of 45 to 60 hours, participants will engage in both theoretical instruction and hands-on practical exercises, employing the latest tools and technologies used in the industry. The curriculum covers a broad spectrum of cybersecurity domains including system security, Linux security, incident management, cyberattacks, security software, and strategy development. With a strong emphasis on real-world applications, the course aims to develop proficient cybersecurity professionals capable of addressing the dynamic challenges faced by organizations today. Through a blend of lectures, lab exercises, case studies, and capstone projects, students will acquire critical thinking and problem-solving skills, preparing them for successful careers in the cybersecurity field.
whatWillILearn: Analyze cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities to develop effective defense strategies.
Design and implement secure network architectures using the latest security software and tools.
Manage and respond

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the Cyber Security course?
faqs.answer: You'll need access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer, and a stable internet connection.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the Cyber Security course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required, but a basic understanding of computer networks and operating systems can be beneficial.

faqs.question: How long does the Cyber Security course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course typically takes 10 to 14 weeks to complete, depending on your pace and schedule.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes hands-on labs, simulations, and practical exercises to provide real-world experience in cyber security techniques and tools.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Cyber Security course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll have a solid understanding of cyber security principles, threat detection and mitigation techniques, and be equipped to pursue roles in security analysis, incident response, or network defense.

courses.title: Data Model
courses.overview: This course aims to provide an in-depth understanding of data modeling techniques essential for designing efficient and effective data structures. Students will learn various data modeling concepts, from basic to advanced levels, including relational, dimensional, and NoSQL data modeling. The course incorporates a balanced mix of theoretical concepts and hands-on practical sessions to ensure a profound grasp of data modeling and its applications in real-world scenarios. By the end of the course, learners will be equipped with the necessary skills to design, implement, and manage complex data models that are crucial for data-driven decision-making processes.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and interpret complex data requirements to develop efficient data models.
Design and implement relational and NoSQL data models to support varied data management systems.
Apply normalization and denormalization techniques to optimize database performance.

courses.title: AI Game Dev
courses.overview: This comprehensive course is designed to equip students with the advanced skills needed to excel in AI Game Development and Automation using Reinforcement Learning in MATLAB. The course covers the fundamentals of reinforcement learning, its application in creating intelligent game agents, and automation tasks. Through a blend of theoretical concepts and extensive hands-on practice, students will learn to design, implement, and optimize AI strategies for games and automation processes. The curriculum includes real-world case studies, design-based assignments, and capstone projects that mirror industry challenges, ensuring students gain job-ready skills. By the end of the course, participants will have a robust portfolio demonstrating their expertise in leveraging reinforcement learning in MATLAB for solving complex problems in game development and automation.
whatWillILearn: Apply reinforcement algorithms to develop intelligent game agents. Utilize MATLAB for testing reinforcement learning models. Designing automate complex tasks using AI strategies.

faqs.question: What core concepts of AI will I learn in this Game Development course?
faqs.answer: Dive into pathfinding algorithms, decision-making processes, and character behavior modeling essential for game AI.

faqs.question: How does the course incorporate machine learning into game development?
faqs.answer: Learn to apply machine learning techniques for dynamic game environments, NPC behavior, and adaptive gameplay challenges.

courses.title: Decision Making
courses.overview: This course is designed to equip students and professionals in the engineering, technology, management, and science domains with the skills required to apply Bayesian Networks for decision-making and predictive analysis. Bayesian Networks are graphical models that represent the probabilistic relationships among variables. They are widely used for risk assessment, decision-making under uncertainty, and predictive modeling in various engineering fields. The course combines theoretical knowledge with practical, hands-on sessions, allowing students to apply concepts to real-world scenarios. By the end of the course, participants will be proficient in constructing Bayesian Networks, understanding their dynamics, and applying them in their respective fields for informed decision-making and predictive analysis.
whatWillILearn: Explain the principles and theory behind Bayesian Networks and their application in engineering (Understand, Explain).
Construct and interpret Bayesian Networks using appropriate software tools (Apply, Analyze).
Perform predictive analysis and decision-making under uncertainty using Bayesian models (Evaluate, Create).

lessons.lesson_name: Healthcare and Biomedical Engineering: Patient Diagnosis and Prognosis
Understand and analyze existing BN models in industry
Review specific BN models used in industry
Apply knowledge to design and implement a BN project

Students will explore the fundamentals of R programming, data manipulation, and visualization before moving on to the intricacies of dynamic report generation with Knitr. Through a blend of lectures and practical sessions, participants will learn to create comprehensive, interactive, and visually appealing reports. The curriculum is designed to equip students with the skills needed to analyze and present data effectively, making them valuable assets in the job market.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and Manipulate Data: Utilize R programming to clean, analyze, and manipulate datasets.
Generate Dynamic Reports: Create interactive reports and documents using Knitr.
Visualize Data: Craft compelling visualizations to represent complex datasets clearly.

courses.title: Docker
courses.overview: This Docker certificate course is meticulously designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry needs, targeting students and freshers from engineering, technology, management, and science domains. Docker, a pivotal tool in software development and deployment, encapsulates software into standardized units for development, shipment, and deployment, known as containers. This course covers Docker's essentials to advanced concepts, emphasizing practical, hands-on sessions to ensure learners can navigate the complexities of containerization, orchestration, microservices, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) workflows. With an equal emphasis on lectures and practical sessions, the curriculum spans from Docker fundamentals, image creation, management, networking, and data persistence to orchestrating containers with Docker Compose and Docker Swarm. Real-world case studies, design-based assignments, and capstone projects ensure a comprehensive understanding, enabling students to harness Docker in diverse computing environments efficiently.
whatWillILearn: This Docker certificate course is meticulously designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry needs, targeting students and freshers from engineering, technology, management, and science domains. Docker, a pivotal tool in software development and deployment, encapsulates software into standardized units for development, shipment, and deployment, known as containers. This course covers Docker's essentials to advanced concepts, emphasizing practical, hands-on sessions to ensure learners can navigate the complexities of containerization, orchestration, microservices, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) workflows. With an equal emphasis on lectures and practical sessions, the curriculum spans from Docker fundamentals, image creation, management, networking, and data persistence to orchestrating containers with Docker Compose and Docker Swarm. Real-world case studies, design-based assignments, and capstone projects ensure a comprehensive understanding, enabling students to harness Docker in diverse computing environments efficiently.
Implement Docker networking to facilitate communication between containers and integration into larger software architectures.
Develop proficiency in Docker orchestration tools like Docker Compose and Docker Swarm for managing multiple containers.

faqs.answer: You'll need access to the course materials, a computer, and a stable internet connection.

faqs.answer: No, but basic software development understanding is helpful.

faqs.question: How long does the Docker course take to complete?
faqs.answer: Typically 6 to 8 weeks, varies based on pace.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations?
faqs.answer: Yes, plenty of hands-on labs and exercises.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Docker course?
faqs.answer: You'll master Docker containerization, deployment, and management.

courses.title: Big data
courses.overview: This course is designed to equip students and fresh graduates with the essential skills and knowledge to analyze, manage, and derive insights from large data sets using modern Big Data technologies and frameworks. The curriculum blends theoretical concepts with practical, hands-on sessions to ensure students not only understand the principles of Big Data processing but also gain practical experience in handling real-world data challenges. The course covers various aspects of Big Data, including data collection, storage, processing, analysis, and visualization, along with an introduction to Big Data ecosystems and tools such as Hadoop, Spark, and cloud-based Big Data services. Students will learn through a combination of lectures, case studies, lab sessions, and capstone projects, preparing them for careers in data science, data analytics, and Big Data engineering. This course aims to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements, ensuring students are job-ready upon completion.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and process large data sets using Big Data frameworks like Hadoop and Spark.
Develop efficient data pipelines and ETL processes for data ingestion and loading.
Big Data storage solutions using technologies such as HDFS and NoSQL databases.

faqs.question: What fundamental concepts will I learn in a Big Data course?
faqs.answer: Understand key principles like data mining, storage solutions, and processing frameworks essential for managing large datasets.

faqs.question: How does the course cover data analysis and visualization in Big Data?
faqs.answer: Learn techniques for extracting insights from massive datasets and visualizing them effectively using tools like Tableau and Power BI.

faqs.question: What are the ethical considerations discussed in the Big Data course?
faqs.answer: Explore the ethical implications of data collection, privacy concerns, and responsible usage of big data analytics.

faqs.question: Will I gain hands-on experience with Big Data tools and technologies?
faqs.answer: Yes, apply big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, and NoSQL databases through practical exercises and projects.

faqs.question: How does the Big Data course address the challenges of data integration and quality?
faqs.answer: Learn strategies for integrating disparate data sources and ensuring data quality and consistency in big data environments.

courses.title: Power Bi
courses.overview: This comprehensive course is designed to equip students and fresh graduates from engineering, technology, management, and science disciplines with advanced skills in using Power BI for data analytics and visualization. Power BI, a leading tool in the business intelligence realm, enables users to transform data into rich visuals and insights, facilitating better decision-making processes. This course covers a spectrum of topics from basic data integration to advanced data modeling, DAX, and custom visualizations, combined with hands-on sessions for real-world applications. Participants will learn through a blend of theoretical concepts and practical exercises, culminating in capstone projects that tackle industry-relevant challenges. Upon completion, students will have mastered the art of turning data into compelling stories, making them invaluable assets in the job market.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and Visualize Data: Employ Power BI to create dynamic reports and dashboards from various data sources.
Data Transformation: Use Power Query to clean, shape, and transform data for analysis.
Master DAX: Understand and apply Data Analysis Expressions for complex data calculations.

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the Power BI course?
faqs.answer: To start, you'll need access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer capable of running Power BI Desktop (Windows-based), and a stable internet connection for accessing Power BI Service and downloading datasets.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the Power BI course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. However, a basic understanding of data analysis concepts and familiarity with Excel will be beneficial for grasping Power BI functionalities more quickly.

faqs.question: How long does the Power BI course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course is typically designed to be completed within 8 to 12 weeks, depending on your learning pace and the time dedicated to hands-on exercises and projects.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or projects in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes practical, hands-on training with Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service, including building dashboards, creating reports, and working on real-world data projects to apply what you've learned.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Power BI course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll be able to extract data from various sources, transform and clean that data, create visual reports and dashboards, and share your insights with others. You'll be prepared for roles that require data visualization, reporting, and business intelligence skills.

courses.title: Deep Learning
courses.overview: This deep learning course aims to bridge theoretical knowledge with practical skills, essential for tackling real-world problems. Targeted at students and freshers from STEM backgrounds, this curriculum is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of deep learning techniques and their applications. Students will learn through a blend of lectures, hands-on sessions, case studies, and capstone projects, ensuring a deep understanding and the ability to apply deep learning models to various domains such as healthcare, autonomous vehicles, and natural language processing. The course will cover foundational topics such as neural network basics, to more advanced subjects like convolutional and recurrent neural networks, deep reinforcement learning, and generative adversarial networks. With an emphasis on hands-on learning, students will build, train, and deploy their own deep learning models. Upon completion, students will receive a Certificate of Achievement, validating their skills
whatWillILearn: Analyze complex problems and apply deep learning techniques for solutions.
Evaluate and optimize deep learning models using techniques like transfer learning and data augmentation.

courses.title: Prompt Engineering
courses.overview: This course is meticulously designed to equip students and freshers from engineering, technology, management, and science backgrounds with in-depth knowledge and practical skills in prompt engineering using ChatGPT and other large language models (LLMs). As the demand for skilled professionals in generative AI and prompt engineering skyrockets, this course offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience to prepare participants for the challenges and opportunities in this emerging field. Through a series of lectures, practical sessions, and project-based learning, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the principles of prompt engineering, including crafting effective prompts, understanding model outputs, and applying these skills in various domains such as content generation, customer service, and more. The curriculum is aligned with the highest standards of industry and academic excellence, ensuring that participants not only gain theoretical knowledge but also develop practical skills that are highly valued in the job market.

faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required, but a basic understanding of computer networks and operating systems can be beneficial.

faqs.question: How long does the Cyber Security course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course typically takes 10 to 14 weeks to complete, depending on your pace and schedule.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes hands-on labs, simulations, and practical exercises to provide real-world experience in cyber security techniques and tools.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Cyber Security course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll have a solid understanding of cyber security principles, threat detection and mitigation techniques, and be equipped to pursue roles in security analysis, incident response, or network defense.

instructor.about: I'm Abhishek, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I am a developer in Microsoft and Google. I realised that my greatest passion is teaching. I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand. I'll be there for you every step of the way.

courses.title: ENGINEERING AUDIT
courses.overview: This course is designed to bridge the gap between theoretical engineering concepts and practical applications in audit and risk management. Throughout the course, students will learn how to utilize leading audit tools, understand risk management principles, and apply these practices in engineering projects. The curriculum combines hands-on sessions with lectures to ensure a comprehensive understanding of conducting audits and managing risks in engineering contexts. By exploring case studies, software tools, and real-world scenarios, students will gain the skills needed to perform effective engineering audits and implement risk management strategies that adhere to industry standards and best practices.
whatWillILearn: Analyze engineering projects for compliance with industry standards using audit tools.
Design and implement risk management strategies to mitigate project risks effectively.
Evaluate the efficiency and quality of engineering processes through systematic audits.

lessons.lesson_name: Introduction to MATLAB for Data Analysis

curriculum.chapter_name: Case Studies in Engineering Audits and Risk Management

lessons.lesson_name: Review of Real-World Engineering Audit Cases
Discussion on Risk Management Success Stories
Applying Audit Tools and Risk Management Strategies
Presentation and Evaluation of Capstone Projects

faqs.question: What do I need to get started?
faqs.answer: Access to course materials, a computer, and internet.

faqs.question: Any prerequisite knowledge required?
faqs.answer: No, but engineering terminology understanding helps.

faqs.question: How long to complete the course?
faqs.answer: Typically 6-8 weeks.

faqs.question: Hands-on training or simulations?
faqs.answer: Yes, practical case studies included.

faqs.question: What will I learn?
faqs.answer: Basics of engineering audit, evaluation techniques, and compliance standards.

instructor.about: As a software developer at Microsoft with a background from SRM University Chennai, I have cultivated extensive experience in technology and education. My dedication to mentoring budding developers has enabled me to impact many students' careers positively. Leveraging my comprehensive industry experience, I strive to guide and inspire the next generation of innovators.

courses.title: SEO
courses.overview: This course is designed to equip learners with the latest SEO strategies essential for excelling in digital marketing and e-commerce. Through a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical applications, students will delve into advanced SEO techniques, content optimization, link-building strategies, and performance analytics. The curriculum is structured to provide hands-on experience with real-world projects, ensuring learners can implement SEO strategies effectively. The course aims to bridge the gap between academic knowledge and industry requirements, preparing students for successful careers in digital marketing and e-commerce.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and implement advanced SEO strategies to enhance website visibility and rankings.
Optimize website content for search engines and user engagement.
Develop and execute effective link-building campaigns to improve domain authority

lessons.lesson_name: Search Engines and How They Work

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the SEO course?
faqs.answer: Access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer, and a stable internet connection are necessary to begin.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the SEO course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required, but a basic understanding of websites, online marketing, and search engines can be beneficial.

faqs.question: How long does the SEO course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course typically takes 6 to 8 weeks to complete, depending on your pace and schedule.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes practical exercises, live demonstrations, and case studies to provide real-world experience in optimizing websites for search engines.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the SEO course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll have a thorough understanding of SEO techniques, keyword research, on-page optimization, off-page optimization, and be able to implement strategies to improve website visibility and ranking in search engine results.

courses.title: Problem Solving
courses.overview: This comprehensive course is designed to equip STEM students and fresh graduates with advanced problem-solving skills, crucial for success in academia and industry. It combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications to address real-world challenges. Through lectures, hands-on sessions, case studies, and capstone projects, participants will learn systematic approaches to identify, analyze, and solve complex problems. The curriculum integrates concepts from engineering, technology, management, and science, fostering interdisciplinary collaboration. Participants will engage in reflective practice, critical thinking, and innovative problem-solving strategies, enhancing their employability and professional development.
whatWillILearn: Analyze engineering projects for compliance with industry standards using audit tools.
Design and implement risk management strategies to mitigate project risks effectively.
Evaluate the efficiency and quality of engineering processes through systematic audits.

faqs.question: What do you need to get started with the Problem Solving course?
faqs.answer: You'll need access to the course materials (provided after enrollment), a computer or tablet, and a stable internet connection. A notebook or digital tool for note-taking and sketching ideas is also recommended.

faqs.question: Is there any prerequisite knowledge required for the Problem Solving course?
faqs.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. However, an open mind and willingness to tackle complex problems through creative thinking and analytical approaches are beneficial.

faqs.question: How long does the Problem Solving course take to complete?
faqs.answer: The course is typically designed to be completed within 4 to 6 weeks, depending on your pace of study and the depth of engagement with the provided exercises and case studies.

faqs.question: Will there be any hands-on training or simulations in this course?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course includes a variety of practical exercises, interactive problem-solving sessions, and real-world case studies to apply problem-solving techniques and strategies in diverse scenarios.

faqs.question: What will I be able to do after completing the Problem Solving course?
faqs.answer: After completing the course, you'll be equipped with a toolkit of problem-solving strategies, able to approach and solve challenges in both professional and personal contexts creatively and effectively. You'll have the skills to analyze problems, generate solutions, and implement them successfully.

instructor.about: I'm Abhishek, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I am a developer in Microsoft and Google. I realised that my greatest passion is teaching. I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand. I'll be there for you every step of the way.

courses.title: Business Intelligence
courses.overview: This Business Intelligence Certification Program is designed to bridge the gap between academic knowledge and industry demands, providing students and professionals with the skills and insights needed to excel in the field of business intelligence (BI). Covering a range of topics from data warehousing and mining to BI tools and applications in various sectors such as finance, healthcare, e-commerce, and more, this course offers a comprehensive learning experience. Through hands-on sessions, theoretical concepts, case studies, and capstone projects, participants will learn to analyze complex data, derive actionable insights, and make data-driven decisions that benefit their organizations. The curriculum is structured to cater to undergraduates, postgraduates, PhD candidates, and freshers from engineering, technology, management, and science domains, aiming to equip them with in-demand BI skills.
whatWillILearn: Analyze and interpret business data to support decision-making processes.
Design and implement data warehouses, understanding the architecture for BI.
Utilize BI tools and software for data visualization and dashboard creation.

lessons.lesson_name: Importance of BI in Today's Business Environment
Types of Data: Structured vs. Unstructured
Introduction to Big Data in BI

curriculum.chapter_name: AI and Machine Learning in BI

lessons.lesson_name: Machine Learning Models for Predictive Analytics

faqs.question: What key skills and concepts will I learn in a Business Intelligence course?
faqs.answer: Learn to analyze data, create reports and dashboards, and use BI tools like Tableau, Power BI, and SQL for insightful decision-making.

faqs.question: How does the course address data warehousing in the context of Business Intelligence?
faqs.answer: Understand the principles of data warehousing, ETL processes, and how they support BI analytics and reporting.

faqs.question: Will I learn about predictive analytics in this Business Intelligence course?
faqs.answer: Yes, delve into predictive analytics techniques and how they are applied within BI to forecast business outcomes.

faqs.question: Does the course cover real-world Business Intelligence applications?
faqs.answer: Explore case studies and real-world applications to understand how BI drives strategic decisions in various industries.

faqs.question: What are the ethical considerations discussed in the Business Intelligence course?
faqs.answer: Discuss ethical issues around data privacy, security, and the responsible use of business intelligence in decision-making.

instructor.about: I'm Angela, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I'm the lead instructor at the London App Brewery, London's leading Programming Bootcamp. I've helped hundreds of thousands of students learn to code and change their lives by becoming a developer. I've been invited by companies such as Twitter, Facebook and Google to teach their employees. My first foray into programming was when I was just 12 years old, wanting to build my own Space Invader game. Since then, I've made hundred of websites, apps and games. But most importantly, I realised that my greatest passion is teaching. I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand. I'll be there for you every step of the way.
